_sText:
de_mangashop_beta
by Xale (adam050986@yahoo.fr)


Credits & Thanks :

- NeoTokyo Source (TRY THIS MOD !)
- Gaming-models.de
- cgtextures.com
- Valve (Left4dead 1&2)
- FPSBANANA
- Mapping-area
- Lots, lots, lots of people I forgot...



I think you can also thanks the company that fires me, allowing me to have MUCH time to spend on this project !!!! :D



Original Credits (CS 1.6) :

- CS:Condition Zero : deleted scene
- Naruto : Naiteki Kensei & ESF (HL1 Mods)
- ginsengavenger (cs_industrywest)
- Dr.DeK & DeBUGGeR (de_leestore)
- Sm0lders (cs_robbery)
- Philip Klevestav (de_morningstar)
- 3DMike (de_dealock, de_747, cs_bikini)
- FPSBanana & beta-testers

==============
MAP OBJECTIVES
==============


Map objectives :


- Convert the original de_mangashop to Source-Engine
- Get normal light, normal textures (no texture error)
- Improve general graphic with props
- Use new props
- Use new textures
- Get rid of that "american/destroyed look" and get something that is more "european" & "new"
- Have some special effects that are funny
- Have a descent framerate, based on official maps framerate.
- Have a final map that, compressed, weight less than 30MB



In final, I spend hours and hours (I think above 600 or 900) to bring you this map.


Anyway, I think the result is honest. If you have *constructive* comments, feel free to post one.

If you have dumb comments, don't post it. Just remember I've done the map all by myself (expect props/materials from other people), and with very few help (80% of the forum pals tells you "google it"...).

If you feel you can do better, I've included the *.vmf, so feel free to make your own version ;).
